channel.title: CSV from URL data source
channel.description: Hi all! I don't have CSV from URL data source on my self-hosted Redash? how can it be added? Also I tried using Google Sheets instead, but I try to choose a query error exists : It seems like we encountered an error. Try refreshing this page or contact your administrator.

item.title: CSV from URL data source
item.dc:creator: Amanekkk
item.description:
Could you explain in steps how I can implement these ones?

Read full topic

item.title: CSV from URL data source
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
See here:

Missing CSV Data Source in self hosted version Self Hosted Redash Support
The CSV query runner isn’t part of our open source repo yet. But I’ve received permission to open source it separately in this gist: There’s a separate implementation in an open pull request on our open source repo which includes support for Excel files: Either of these can work with Redash. We will eventually circulate the CSV query runner as part of the main repo, it’s just a low priority for now (three people expressed interest in the last two years).

The PR mentioned in that post has now been merged into the tip of master. I’m checking whether we can include it in the V10 release (currently in beta). Otherwise it will definitely be part of V11.

Read full topic
